Title: The Burlap Trail: To Kota Basecamp
Description:
This here's hozen lands. Very dangerous. But grummles must trek through. Supplies must reach the Serpent's Spine.

Go, protect the next wave of grummles on their trek to Kota Basecamp.

If at least one survives, good fortune will find its way to you.
ObjectivesText:
Protect a group of grummles from the Burlap Waystation to the Kota Basecamp. At least one grummle must survive.

If you lose your grummles, you can search the Burlap Trial or return to the Burlap Waystation and wait for the next group to leave.
RewardText: Ha ha! Hero of grummles! Welcome to Kota Basecamp. Enjoy good fortune for most happy grummle delivery.
